Next, what are goats? They are a domesticated mammal, that belongs to the family Bovidae and genus Capra.

So now we can come to the answer. As goats are a domesticated mammal, typically found on land and in farm settings, it is highly unlikely that they would be found on abyssal plains which are found in the deep ocean. Therefore the correct answer is (B) no.
